SELECT t.*,s.status_name,u.real_name FROM jiebao_jpms_proposal t,jiebao_jpms_status s ,jiebao_jpms_user u
t.`status` = s.id and t.user_id = u.user_id
and t.cause like concat('%', #{cause}, '%')
and t.status BETWEEN 4 and 9
and t.status = #{status}
ORDER BY t.proposal_number desc

SELECT t.*,s.status_name,u.real_name,d.unit_name FROM jiebao_jpms_proposal t,jiebao_jpms_status s ,jiebao_jpms_user u, jiebao_jpms_unit d
t.`status` = s.id and t.user_id = u.user_id and t.unit_id = d.unit_id and t.user_id = #{userId} and t.`status` != -1
and t.cause like concat('%', #{cause}, '%')
and t.proposal_id = #{status}
ORDER BY t.proposal_number desc
